Text:
Hey you have some pretty great evidence here, man I just can't believe how clear those spheres were near the sun and moving like that.. There really is something, and I'm not even going to waste time trying to debunk something like that. The evidence is clear people, just pay attention...

Anyway thanks for making POTHS! I gotta admit, you have some really great stuff here!
Hey do you have that link from that video of the pictures taken next to the sun?
